mapper.select: SELECT RENT_PLACE_ID rentPlaceId, PLACE_ID placeId, USER_M_ID userId, RENT_DATE rentDate, START_TIME startTime, END_TIME endTime, REQUEST_DATE requestDate, STATUS FROM RENT_PLACE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RENT_PLACE VALUES (RENT_PLACE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{placeId},#{userId}, TO_DATE(#{rentDate},'YYYY-MM-DD'),TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),TO_DATE(#{endTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{request_date},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')1 )
